alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 1:26PM CDT until August 24 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... South Central Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, Heavy showers and thunderstorms continue to develop across the region, producing torrential rainfall across portions of southeastern Mississippi and southwestern Alabama. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Grove Hill, Chatom, Richton, Leakesville, Wagarville, Saint Stephens, Leroy, Clara, Deer Park, Whatley, Tibbie, Beaumont, Calvert, New Augusta, Millry, McLain, State Line, Buckatunna and Fruitdale. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
